sentences.en: A dictionary may define genetics as simply " the science of the study of heredity ".
sentences.cn: 词典上会把遗传学简单地定为 “ 研究遗传的科学. ”

sentences.en: Adler rejected the idea that a human being is simply a product of environment and heredity.
sentences.cn: 阿德勒反对个人只是环境与遗传产物的观念.

sentences.en: Gene: Unit of heredity that occupies a fixed position on a chromosome.
sentences.cn: 基因: 在染色体上占据固定位置的遗传单位.

sentences.en: Heredity also plays a role in some types of mental illness.
sentences.cn: 遗传在某些精神病中也有作用.

sentences.en: Heredity and environment are influences on character.
sentences.cn: 遗传和环境是影响性格的因素.

sentences.en: Heredity is not a factor in causing the cancer.
My height comes from my heredity.
Radiation has a strong effect on the heredity of fruit flies.
sentences.cn: 射线对于果蝇的遗传产生强烈的作用.

sentences.en: Sins were no longer sins, if men's actions were determined by heredity and environment.
sentences.cn: 如果人类行为取决于遗传和环境,那么犯罪就不再是罪恶.

sentences.en: Some diseases are present by heredity.
the debate over the effects of heredity and environment
sentences.cn: 有关遗传与环境影响的辩论

sentences.en: The moral characters of men are formed not by heredity but by environment.
sentences.cn: 人的道德品质不是遗传的，而是由环境塑造而成。

sentences.en: Thethe hereditary phenomena of structure, heredity in steel and influencing the inheritance.
sentences.cn: 本文研究了钢的组织遗传现象 、 遗传因子及其影响因素.

sentences.en: This is because the determinants of heredity maintain their integrity generation by generation.
sentences.cn: 这是因为遗传因子一代又一代地保存它们的完整性.

sentences.en: Visible, myopia is heredity and environment the result of joint action.
sentences.cn: 可见, 近视是遗传和环境共同作用的结果.

words.tran_cn: 遗传的；世袭的；世代相传的

trans.tran_en: the process by which mental and physical qualities are passed from a parent to a child before the child is born
